report_definition.name: Report Allarmi Emissioni R-104
report_definition.sql_command: SELECT TEMP.DATA_SUP, TEMP.ORA_SUP, FIRST(TEMP.DATA_INF), FIRST(TEMP.ORA_INF), MAX(TEMP.ESP_1), MAX(TEMP.ESP_2), MAX(TEMP.ESP_3), MAX(TEMP.ESP_4), MAX(TEMP.ESP_5) FROM (SELECT (SOGLIE_SUP.DATA) AS DATA_SUP, (SOGLIE_SUP.ORA) AS ORA_SUP, (SOGLIE_INF.DATA) AS DATA_INF, (SOGLIE_INF.ORA) AS ORA_INF, IIf([SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104]= 1,"Alta conc.",(IIf([SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104]= 6, "Altissima conc.", "--"))) AS ESP_1, IIf([SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104]= 2,"Alta conc.", (IIf([SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104]= 7,"Altissima conc.", "--"))) AS ESP_2, IIf([SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104]= 3,"Alta conc.", (IIf([SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104]= 8,"Altissima conc.", "--"))) AS ESP_3, IIf([SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104]= 4,"Alta conc.", (IIf([SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104]= 9,"Altissima conc.", "--"))) AS ESP_4, IIf([SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104]= 5,"Alta conc.", (IIf([SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104]= 10,"Altissima conc.", "--"))) AS ESP_5 FROM SOGLIE_SUP RIGHT JOIN SOGLIE_INF ON SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104 = SOGLIE_INF.INF_R104 WHERE ((DateValue(SOGLIE_SUP.DATA)) BETWEEN DateValue("%date_from%") AND DateValue("%date_to%")) AND (SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104 > 0) AND ((SOGLIE_SUP.DATA) < (SOGLIE_INF.DATA)) OR (((SOGLIE_SUP.DATA) = (SOGLIE_INF.DATA)) AND ((SOGLIE_SUP.ORA) < (SOGLIE_INF.ORA)) AND SOGLIE_SUP.SUP_R104 > 0) ORDER BY SOGLIE_SUP.DATA, SOGLIE_SUP.ORA, SOGLIE_INF.DATA, SOGLIE_INF.ORA) AS TEMP WHERE (Datevalue(TEMP.DATA_SUP) BETWEEN DateValue("%date_from%") AND DateValue("%date_to%")) GROUP BY TEMP.DATA_SUP, TEMP.ORA_SUP;
